containers.description: Enhance your Workers with serverless containerized applications.
containers.get_started.title: Get started with Containers
containers.get_started.description: With Containers, you can build applications that seamlessly integrate Workers with a serverless container runtime.

containers.sidebar.cli.title: Start with CLI
containers.sidebar.cli.description: Get started with CLI for Workers for Platforms
containers.sidebar.analytics.requests.to: Total request count across all Workers in a dispatch namespace.
containers.sidebar.analytics.cpu_time.to: CPU time combined across Dispatch Workers and Workers in a dispatch  namespace.
containers.sidebar.analytics.scripts.too: The number of Workers combined across all dispatch namespaces.
containers.metrics.aggregate.tooltip: Aggregate metrics across all instances in the application
containers.metrics.aggregate.disabled.to: Metrics aggregation cannot be disabled when there are more than %{limit} instances
containers.container.no_instances: This Container has no instances. If you have just deployed the Container, it may take a few minutes for the instances to be provisioned.
containers.container.no_instances.ready: You have no running containers (but they are ready to go)
containers.container.no_instances.check_: You have no running containers (check back later)
